alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 05 at 4:08AM EDT until July 05 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 434 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ADAMS ALLEN IN CASS IN DE KALB FULTON IN HUNTINGTON KOSCIUSKO MIAMI NOBLE PULASKI STEUBEN WABASH WELLS WHITE WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN HILLSDALE IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO DEFIANCE PAULDING VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AKRON, ALBION, ANGOLA, ANTWERP, AUBURN, BERNE, BLUFFTON, BROOKSTON, BRYAN, COLUMBIA CITY, DECATUR, DEFIANCE, EDGERTON, FORT WAYNE, FRANCESVILLE, FREMONT, GARRETT, GRISSOM AFD, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, HUNTINGTON, JONESVILLE, KENDALLVILLE, LIGONIER, LITCHFIELD, LOGANSPORT, MEDARYVILLE, MENTONE, MEXICO, MONON, MONTICELLO, MONTPELIER, NEW HAVEN, NORTH MANCHESTER, OHIO CITY, OSSIAN, PAULDING, PAYNE, PERU, ROANOKE, ROCHESTER, ROYAL CENTER, SHERWOOD, SOUTH WHITLEY, SYRACUSE, TRI-LAKES, VAN WERT, WABASH, WARSAW, WINAMAC, AND WINONA LAKE.
